      • readFile

        public void readFile​(java.io.File fileName)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads this path dependent uncertainty object from a file. The format of the file is deduced by reading a handful of bytes from the beginning of the file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the File
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
